channel.title: How do i put server Online? plz help me.... its Oldderi Server and client
channel.description: i downloaded this server and client from http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,485264.0.html and friend wants play with me but we dont know how to put online. i got a server ip adress, where do i put in my server so it can be online? Thx for your time, i am not a leecher friend just wants to play server with me so all credits are to People who made Oldderi server and client.

item.title: How do i put server Online? plz help me.... its Oldderi Server and client
item.dc:creator: @Pazaz Pazaz
item.description:
@Pazaz wrote:

[quote=“ufcaustyn, post:1, topic:418241”]i downloaded this server and client from http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,485264.0.html and friend wants play with me but we dont know how to put online. i got a server ip adress, where do i put in my server so it can be online?
Thx for your time, i am not a leecher friend just wants to play server with me so all credits are to People who made Oldderi server and client.[/quote]
You could host a server via Hamachi - Or Port Fowarding. I will not post a tutorial on this, As there are easily 100+ tutorials on both. Use the search function, Or go into the ‘Server Tutorials’ Section

Read full topic
